definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]

Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
lit. a banquet with no empty seats/full house/capacity crowd/standing room only
